form.name: form
form.description: The form upon which will trigger this node when a new entry is made. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
form.ai_hint: The form upon which will trigger this node when a new entry is made. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

onlyAnswers.name: onlyAnswers
onlyAnswers.description: Whether to return only the answers of the form and not any of the other data
